website_summaries.verdict: While this is primarily designed for bee bites, reviewers say it works great on mosquito bites.
pros: Tiny bottles make this perfect for first-aid kits, beach bags, and purses
Owners swear it kills the pain and relieves itching within seconds
Parents mention that it works particularly well on kids, stopping tears instantly
cons: Packaging a little hard to open, especially if you are in pain

customer_reviews.title: Fast pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: We've used these Sting-Kill anesthetic swabs for several years. The only place I can find them is on Amazon. They provide fast relief from bee stings by easing most of the pain. I try to keep them at home at all times, and carry them with me to my grandchildren's ballgames. When my 6 year old grandson was stung by a wasp at poolside last summer, a few swabs with one of these gave him enough relief to continue swimming, and stopped his tears. This is something you hope you won't have to use, but well worth every penny when they are needed!
customer_reviews.author: Tomcat 79er

customer_reviews.title: We used to carry these on our sail boat, ...
customer_reviews.text: We used to carry these on our sail boat, where they came in handy when anchored in some backwater. Lately, we were volunteering at a rest stop for the American Diabetes bicycle ride, when one of the motorcycle aid riders got stung by a bee. We didn't have one of these kits with us, so we couldn't help. The next day, I ordered some of these to add to our vehicle first aid kit. At least we'll be prepared next year.
customer_reviews.author: Hate to Shop

customer_reviews.title: Great for outside activities
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I carry it in my emergency bag while I'm out doing yard work or out side in general. It dose help relieve the bites and stings of those insects. Very important please carry your epidural pen if your allergic. This stuff dose not replace your epidural pen.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't be with out it.
customer_reviews.text: I try to keep up with replacing items in my Emergency kit and this miracle worker is as necessary as bandaids. I have used this particular brand for along time because it relieves the symptoms of a sting within a minute. I have used it for Bumble Bee, Honey Bee, Wood wasp, Monster Wasp and even Stinging Nettles...works everytime.!! No downside to this except that sometimes it is challenging to break open the vial. I gave it a 5 star on Easy to use as after you crack the vial and the potion coats the fiber, the ointment distributes easily over the area and stays put.
customer_reviews.author: P. Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: This thing W-O-R-K-S-! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!! IF YOU NEED TO RELIEF THE PAIN B-U-Y THIS!!! is perfect! My mom developed an allergy to Moskito bytes, the area where she got bitten got extremely swollen and it was very painful for her, there was nothing that could calm the pain nor the need to scratch, I was so desperate to find something for her, I'm usually very skeptical about buying this things online, I prefer to take her to a DR but because of all this covid situation we were not able to get a Drs. appointment so I chosed to give it a try... I AM DEFINIYELY rebuying this for her!! It relief the pain so quickly, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: AlouxSchizodellic

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: As a Beekeeper, I need a quick & easy way to treat stings. Availability & cost of Empi Pens isn’t an option for me so I needed something for possible stings. Got stung recently & needed more relief than the Benadryl & ice pack. Bought this at a local store & it worked very quickly , relieving the pain, itching & reducing the swelling. *Besides the effectiveness, the Amazon price is fabulous: two packets (5swabs @ pack) for $8.39 vs $8.79 for 1 pack at local drug stores & retailers.
customer_reviews.author: Connie S.

customer_reviews.title: Performed as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to include in my bushcraft IFAK, but a painter working on the exterior of my home today disturbed a hornets nest and sustained 3 very painful stings. I got a couple of vials of Sting Kill from my IFAK and applied to his stings, which were already swelling. With great surprise and relief he reported that the pain stopped within seconds of application and he's back to work with no pain. Based on this experience I would definitely recommend this product as quick acting and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: I hate hornets
customer_reviews.text: I hate hornets. I really really hate being stung by a hornet good dusting never seems to have any way of making it go away. But this product does stop the pain and swelling. It also works for mosquito bites! That’s why I buy this product because of the mosquito bites
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hall

customer_reviews.title: This is THE one - it works!
customer_reviews.text: I tried multiple different products but this seems to be THE ONE. The packaging alone is already very interesting, only ready when you need it. I will definitely buy it again because Sting-Kill First Aid has my trust. So glad to have found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elke

customer_reviews.title: Breaks in shipping
customer_reviews.text: These are great if they get to you unbroken. I've ordered and re-ordered these and 50% have at least one of the five broken in the package. But if you get them unbroken, this stuff is great for bee / wasp stings!
customer_reviews.author: Curt Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Works great..
customer_reviews.text: I knew my daughter would get a bee sting playing in the pool. I had enough foresight and intelligence to see that the probability of her getting stung was very high. So I immediately ordered these from Amazon and two weeks after they arrived they were used to treat her bee sting.
customer_reviews.author: echotwin

customer_reviews.title: best ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best, as my grandson got stung while at a neighbors, they had these and used one on him, in just seconds it seemed he was fine and not crying with pain and in just couple of minutes the whelp was also gone. I came home right then and ordered these for my own supply. Highly recommend them for your car, shop, camper, you name it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nance

customer_reviews.title: Great for first aid kits.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for first aid kits. Haven’t had to use. Daughter got a bee sting on a hike but didn’t have to break them out. I guess I’ll have to wait until someone gets stung by a wasp. Darn.
customer_reviews.author: tapasos

customer_reviews.title: Must be me....
customer_reviews.text: This really doesn't work on me. The packaging is a pain in the neck too. I really wanted his o work after reading the reviews, but alas, another bite relief bites the dust ;)
customer_reviews.author: Caron A. Mittler

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a great remedy for bee & hornet stings. When we travel or go out in nature they are compact & perfect to bring along. They have come in handy too & so glad I had them when I needed them
customer_reviews.author: DqDaly

customer_reviews.title: Im still itchy :(
customer_reviews.text: Maybe its just me but It doesnt work on mosquito bites. Didnt kill the itch at all. :/ Anyway, Ill let you know if i get stung by a wasp in my sleep again 👍
customer_reviews.author: NiPfi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these! My parents had them on hand when I was growing up and since I purchased these I have used them on mosquito bites and my son’s yellow jacket sting. They are great! Really help with the sting, itch, and discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magic. I keep these in my purse, the car, diaper bag etc. You just never know when or where someone will get a sting. You whip one of these out and in 30 secs you’re a hero. Great product! Works so well to help take the pain away!!
customer_reviews.author: Biker Parents

customer_reviews.title: Yeah it looks good and it's easy to use.  But the relief is minimal
customer_reviews.text: Looks super cool, super easy to use, but barely works. And this is on a simple mosquito bite. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C:\>DOS

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Won’t be without it while in the backcountry! This takes the sting away from wasp bites. I haven’t found anything that works better. My ultra runner friend told me about this.
customer_reviews.author: Michele W.

customer_reviews.title: They are the best to have for any kind of insect bite or sting
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I had to use them shortly after I got attacked by ants. I tried finding them again today after I got stung 3 times by wasps, but couldn't. I just reordered more. Im putting them in my firstaid kits. They are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Whetstone

customer_reviews.title: Good to have in!
customer_reviews.text: These come in so handy with bites & so glad I found them. easy to use & simple but really helps.

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Perfect especially if you have little kids. Can put them in diaper bags and glove boxes.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: A must have in Louisiana. Just put this on sting bite and then takes away pain.

customer_reviews.title: great antiseptic.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It greatly minimized the bulge and sting on the bee -bite.

customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this product the liquid inside does not come out. I have tried to take the cotton out of it the only way you going to get what's inside if you break the bottle
customer_reviews.author: Janice H.

customer_reviews.title: Will keep on hand always.
customer_reviews.text: Best product I have ever used if you use quick after sting.Yellow jackets hit me 3 times,used soon after and relieved pain and itch right away, and wasn’t sore the next day.

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for wasp stings as well as jelly fish stings. Just great stuff to have on hand!

customer_reviews.title: Great!

customer_reviews.text: We have used these for years, and they work great. We have fire ants and wasps, and we use them to kill the pain.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and helps take the pain out of the sting
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This relieved the terrible itch of mosquito bites. I'm like a mosquito magnet. Every summer I endure the bites. Repellants don't even work for me. So I just endure the itch and pain. But this summer I found Sting-Kill and I am relieved in so many ways! Try it. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Ibisibisibis

customer_reviews.title: Takes away the sting!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was stung by a hornet during day camp, and the director used this product on the sting. My daughter, who generally is tough anyways, didn't cry, fuss, or otherwise have her day disrupted from the sting once this was applied. I'm pretty sure there was much less swelling due to the application of this also. No crazy smell. She said it took the sting away instantly. So, we bought some to keep in the packs for hiking and outdoor adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M

customer_reviews.title: A must for first aid kit
customer_reviews.text: We have been having problems with the new strain of those tiny, almost invisible mosquitos that bite several times and leave you itching like crazy. They even bite through clothes. My sister had a horrible reaction to these bites and ended up in urgent care which did nothing to help her so she went on to Amazon and came across this Sting Kill swabs which stopped the pain and itch immediately! This is a life saver to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Puentes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on Centipede stings
customer_reviews.text: I just got bit by a centipede, 2 puncture wounds,immediately tried this solution for the first time and got no relief at all
customer_reviews.author: KonaGal

customer_reviews.title: It does work and fast
customer_reviews.text: I was on a backpacking trip and got stung and a friend had this in her medical kit. It takes the pain away so fast it is almost like a magic trick. Now it is in my medical kit.
customer_reviews.author: N B

customer_reviews.title: Best product for bee stings....Hard to find at retail.....
customer_reviews.text: These are the best product for bee stings I have ever used. Very convenient. Fit in your first aid kit or purse. Hard to find at retail anymore. So happy to find them here. Purchased for our house. Also ordered and had them sent to my daughters' homes. They were thrilled as these were what we used when they were small. Kids & adults really like having the swab to use themselves. Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Canashar

customer_reviews.title: Key item to have on hand in any Texas household, where fire ants roam the 'hood.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think TX (& probably some other states - any with high numbers of fire ants) should deliver a driver's license w/o also having the person (new to TX) buy a pack or two of these. Keep two in your pack or car, for immediate application when someone is bit. I'm afraid my fire ant bites are now smarting again (as they welt up), but sometimes these will save you from the welts too! Either way, they definitely take the itch off for the first 8 hrs or so, if you get this topical anaesthesia onto your skin quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact packaging for a useful ointment
customer_reviews.text: I like how they are individually packaged and have a built in applicator. I tossed the packaging before I needed to use on (for an itchy/painful bug bite), so it took me a few minutes to realize I needed to break the capsule inside like a glow stick. It numbed the pain and lessened the itchiness, so I think it did its job. I'll keep these in my first aid kit.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Hubby thought it was a waste to buy these and have in the first aid ...
customer_reviews.text: Hubby thought it was a waste to buy these and have in the first aid kit. Kiddo got stung 3 days later. Whose the winner? Mwah! Relieved the itch, sting & burn instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: They are tough to open and use. The vial doesn’t cover many bites and it’s pretty ineffectual. Use meat tenderizer it’s cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I am highly allergic to bee stings and have use this product for about 30 years. Works great to kill the sting and keeps swelling down really well. I also take 2 Benadryl when stung and apply sting kill until liquid gone.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I like to keep this product on hand, in the event of the Inevitable bee or wasp sting. Really works - stops the sting instantly. I am so glad this is available here. It is hard For me to find locally.
customer_reviews.author: JayCee

customer_reviews.title: We have a beehive thought these would be great idea to keep on hand.

customer_reviews.author: kerry

customer_reviews.title: It’s an excellent product that does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent way to stop the sting or even itch from an insect. I’ve used for myself and others. It gives quick relief. I used it years ago when a stinging nettle hit the back of my hand. I found it on Amazon in recent years. I highly recommend this product. The swans and the wipes both work well.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, haven't used.
customer_reviews.text: These are a very nice fit in my FAK. Can't comment on how they work as I've not had to use them yet. One of those things you have but hope you don't have to use. Overall happy with the product.

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy again.
customer_reviews.text: God knows this is probably just me & this product might be amazinggggg for others so I am sharing my experience only. I got these for vacation, ended up getting bit by a million mosquitos & 2 fire ants, I praised the lord I took these along with me only to find out they didnt help at all. I didnt feel the cooling sensation I heard about from the youtube reviews nor did it kill the stinging feeling. This was a fail for me.

customer_reviews.text: I am a beekeeper. Symptoms like pain, swelling and itching were reduced in intensity and duration using this and immediate suction at the sting. Sting problems usually lasted at least a week, now less that 48 hours. Works great.

customer_reviews.author: Gene K

product_meta.title: Sting-Kill First Aid Anesthetic Swabs, Instant Pain + Itch Relief From Bee Stings and Bug Bites, 5-count (pack of 2)
feature_bullets: INSTANT PAIN RELIEF + ITCH RELIEF: Sting-Kill's unique formula provides instant relief from pain and itch from bee stings, wasp stings, mosquito bites, jellyfish stings and bites from chiggers, black flies, ants and spiders.
MAXIMUM STRENGTH BUG BITE RELIEF: Our concentrated, over-the-counter insect bite treatment combines benzocaine and menthol to instantly cool and relieve pain + itch.

#1 PHARMACIST RECOMMENDED, FAMILY FRIENDLY: Sting-Kill's sanitary single-use after bite swabs work quickly and are safe for adults and children ages 2 and up. They're also non-staining and non-greasy.
FIRST AID KIT MUST-HAVE: These versatile, easy-to-use swabs are a great addition to your first aid kit at home, as well as in your car and vacation bags.

FOR THE GREAT OUTDOORS AND DEEP WOODS: Our conveniently packable swabs are great for backyard barbecues, camping, hiking and fishing trips. Keep them next to your bug spray and bug repellent for fast relief when you need it most.
